about_the_game:
JRoguePG takes the turn-based battles of a JRPG and combines it with a true Roguelike. From a seasoned JRPG developer, expect a robust and finely-tuned battle system that you will want to dive into again and again with the new classes you unlock, biomes you discover, and randomized equipment you receive during the run.

Evil plagues the world using fear and suffering to gain power. The world's only hope lies within a rift that opens only every decade. This rift allows four heroes to enter and attempt to battle their way to the source of the evil. Upon failure, a portion of the resources and any knowledge gained are left for the next decade's heroes to try again. How many heroes will you sacrifice to the rift in order to defeat Extol?

  • Unlock 30 classes including Ninja, Elementalist, Paladin, Thaumaturgist, Samurai, Hexblade, Battlemage, Lancer, and more!

  • Each class unlocks 3 class abilities any other class can equip

  • 25 different biomes each with different themed monsters to learn how to defeat

  • Expect to use your brain to win battles. There is no mashing A to attack and win or an overpowered ability that kills everything

  • Randomized equipment chests, enemies, and biomes

  • How you build your party matters tremendously with class composition and how you equip them

  • Use resources you gather in the previous run to unlock upgrades like starting with more weapon experience, more frequent rare chests, manipulate the randomized biomes, start with more gold, and more!

  • PERFECT for the Steam Deck!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: A potato
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: None necessary
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: Game runs very efficiently. If you got a Windows PC from the last 15 years, it will run.

short_description: A Roguelike JRPG. Fight progressively harder battles, unlock classes, engage with an deep and finely-balanced battle system, explore 25 unique biomes, and slowly earn power and knowledge. How many generations of heroes will you sacrifice to rid the world of evil? Perfect for the Steam Deck!
